bwwExcerpt: Director Moises Kaufman's adept direction raises expectations. But the play doesn't hold up, eventually collapsing in a muddle of mental masturbation. And even that's a symbol too.

keyPhrases.quote: But the play doesn't hold up, eventually collapsing in a muddle of mental masturbation.
